name: Ale
description: A light, everyday ale served in taverns across the world. A single mug provides a small boost to resolve.

substance.effect: Restores 1 resolve. Cannot restore above half maximum resolve.

name: Wine
description: A refined drink favored by merchants and nobles. A single glass provides a moderate boost to resolve.

substance.effect: Restores 2 resolve. Cannot restore above half maximum resolve.

name: Strong Liquor
description: Potent spirits that deliver a powerful boost to resolve. A single shot burns going down but steadies the nerves.

substance.effect: Restores 3 resolve. Cannot restore above half maximum resolve.
